item.description:
Project Bread is the voice of hungry people in Massachusetts. You can find more at http://www.projectbre...

I have done this walk before and it is fun to walk around Boston neighbourhood, you can check the below route map.
http://www.projectbre...

If interested you can make your donations at the registration desk before walk. You are not obliged to donate, but if lot of people show interest we can create a team and collect funds.

If you can't walk 20 miles, there will be lot of shuttle bus service which take you back to Park street T station.

The walk ends at Boston Common. We can have early dinner at " Bhendi Bajar" and leave. People who can't make it for walk are welcome to join me at Bhendi Bajar.
item.name: Project Bread - Walk for Hunger
